GDPR.AndroidRevokeConsent: Great! We hope you enjoy your personalized ad experience, but if you ever change your mind, you can withdraw your consent by enabling the Opt out of Ads Personalization setting on your mobile device and then revisiting this app
GDPR.AndroidRevokeConsentAlt: Great! We hope you enjoy your personalized ad experience, but if you ever change your mind, you can withdraw your consent by enabling the Opt out of Ads Personalization setting on your mobile device and then revisiting this app
GDPR.Body: Depending on your privacy settings, Kwalee may provide personalised advertising by displaying targeted advertising within this game. Kwalee contracts with partners, who serve advertising into our games. The partners may collect and process personal data such as device identifiers, location data, about adverts that are served, viewed or clicked on. Further information including on Kwalee’s partners can be found in our
GDPR.BodyAlt:
We hope you are excited to play Cricket Star Pro

Before you start, we’d like to ask that you accept our Privacy Policy and that you allow us to collect and process your data in order to display ads that fit your interests better, and to improve the game and fix bugs etc.
The ads and data collection are managed by various partners that we have integrated into the game. 

Further information on Kwalee’s partners can be found in our
GDPR.Footer: I understand that I will still see ads, but they may not be as relevant to my interests.
GDPR.IosRevokeConsent: Great! We hope you enjoy your personalized ad experience, but if you ever change your mind, you can withdraw your consent by enabling the Limit Ad Tracking setting on your mobile device and then revisiting this app
GDPR.IosRevokeConsentAlt: Great! We hope you enjoy your personalized ad experience, but if you ever change your mind, you can withdraw your consent by enabling the Limit Ad Tracking setting on your mobile device and then revisiting this app
GDPR.Link: Privacy Policy which can be viewed here
GDPR.OneTapDesc: Sharing your data allows us to improve the game in the following ways:
GDPR.OneTapGDPRToggleDesc: I agree to allow my data to be collected by Kwalee and its partners as described in the Privacy Policy
GDPR.OneTapListItem1: Offer targeted advertising more relevant to your likes and interests
GDPR.OneTapListItem2: Analyse the way you interact with the game, so we can improve it
GDPR.OneTapListItem4: A regular reminder alerting you that you haven't consented
GDPR.OneTapListItem5: More frequent ads and non-targeted advertising
GDPR.OneTapMainBody1: Before you start playing, we would like to get your consent to collect data from you including your device identifiers, and location data about adverts that are served, viewed or clicked on. This will allow us to provide better quality ads that are more relevant to your interests.
GDPR.OneTapMainBody2: Data is collected on behalf of our partners, as detailed in our Privacy Policy
GDPR.OneTapNotAgreeDesc: If you don’t consent to share your data you will experience:
GDPR.OneTapPolicyToggleDesc: I have read and accept Kwalee’s privacy policy
GDPR.PrivacyTickBox: I allow Kwalee to utilize my advertisement data.
GDPR.SelectAcceptCheck: By checking the I ACCEPT box above, you consent that you have read and agree to our Privacy Policy and that you are over the age of 16.
GDPR.Title: PERSONALIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE

GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage1ChangeAnyTime: You can change this setting in the Application at any time.
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage1Desc: If you choose to continue without giving consent to share your data (as detailed in our Privacy Policy) you will experience some changes to the game:
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage1ListItem1: A regular reminder alerting you that you haven't consented
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage1ListItem2: More frequent ads and non-targeted advertising
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage2ChangeAnyTime: You can change this setting in the Application at any time.
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage2Desc: You have chosen not to consent to share your data (as detailed in our Privacy Policy). This will change the way you experience the game in the following ways:
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage2ListItem1: A regular reminder alerting you that you haven't consented
GDPROneTap.AreYouSureStage2ListItem2: More frequent ads and non-targeted advertising
GDPROneTap.InfoSettingsToggle: I agree to allow my data to be collected by Kwalee and its partners as described in the Privacy Policy

GDPRReminder.Title: Get less ads by adjusting privacy settings

SubscriptionPopup.SmallPrintAndroid:
구독 자동 갱신입니다. 구독은 기간 종료 24시간 전에 꺼지지 않는 한 자동 갱신되며,
 계정에 갱신 요금이 청구됩니다. 계정 설정에서 끌 수 있습니다. 
무료 체험 기간의 미사용 부분은 사용자가 구독을 구매할 때 사라집니다.
